context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service to the airport while he waits for roadside assistance for his car
call a taxi or a ride-hailing service to quickly get him to the airport

call a taxi, Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: thoroughly recheck all transactions made throughout the day and all customers' bills and change given
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the appropriate authority at the bakery
check the security footage to see if there was any mishandling or theft, as well as review the sales records against the registered transactions to find any discrepancies
inform his superior or the owner of the bakery about the missing money
immediately report the missing money to his superior and explain the situation
immediately inform his superior or the owner about the missing money
recheck all the sales records and transactions of the day
check the security footage if available, in case the money was stolen
examine the transactions and receipts for the day to see if there were any mistakes or discrepancies that could account for the missing money
immediately report the discrepancy to his superior or owner of the bakery

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: remain calm and keep everyone else calm, ensure everyone stays together and stays warm, ration the food and water left, and try to find a way to signal for help, such as using a mirror to reflect sunlight
stay put and seek shelter, as moving around could lead them further off course and expend precious energy
find a suitable place to set up a shelter to protect him and his friends from the cold weather
stay put and not wander off
stay put and make themselves visible
build a shelter and start a fire to keep warm
stay put so the rescue crew can find them more easily
stay in one place
stay put and try to create a visible signal for rescue crews
